about_the_game:
Triversal is a simply satisfying spatial puzzle experience that helps you find your chill. Suspend a light orb over a black hole by connecting to nearby supports.

A perfect palette cleanser between intense tasks, Triversal is a snack for your brain, whether you have a couple minutes or a couple hours to play.

This Demo features the "Daily Challenge" where you can compete on a daily global leaderboard. Buy the full game to try out our other modes of play including Puzzle Packs, Endurance and Sandbox Mode.

Pick Up and Play: Triversal is easy to learn and satisfying to master; simply add and remove elastic tethers to pull the light orb so it centers on the black hole. It’s as easy as 1-2-3.



Streamer Assist: Collaborate with your streaming audience with the Streamer Assist feature, an optional overlay that adds numbered labels to your puzzles, allowing viewers to play along in chat by suggesting solutions.
detailed_description:
About the Triversal Demo

Find your chill with the Triversal demo, featuring Survival and Endless modes. In Survival you can challenge yourself to see how many puzzles can you solve, given a limited number of moves. Endless is just what it sounds like- Endless relaxing puzzles. The demo includes two visual skins and two music options, but locks our other gameplay modes until full release. Wishlist to find out when we launch!


Join our Discord Community
